oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Month radio spots - various - 1973
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various radio spots for Country Music Month 1973, featuring Ernest Tubb (performer), Leroy Van Dyke (performer), Tex Ritter (performer), Mac Wiseman (performer), Chet Atkins (performer), Connie Smith (performer), Bing Crosby (announcer), Minnie Pearl (performer), Tanya Tucker (performer), Loretta Lynn (performer), and other unidentified male and female artists.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Country Music Month radio spot (Ernest Tubb) -- (00:30) Country Music Month radio spot (Leroy Van Dyke) -- (01:00) Country Music Month radio spot (Tex Ritter) -- (01:41) Country Music Month radio spot (Mac Wiseman) -- (01:58) Country Music Month radio spot (Chet Atkins) -- (02:13) Country Music Month radio spot (Connie Smith) -- (02:30) Country Music Month radio spot (Minnie Pearl, Bing Crosby) -- (03:24) Country Music Month radio spot (Tanya Tucker) -- (03:52) Country Music Month radio spot ([Unidentified]) -- (04:14) Country Music Month radio spot (Loretta Lynn) -- (04:35) Country Music Month radio spot ([Unidentified]) -- (04:50) Country Music Month radio spot ([Unidentified]) -- (05:10) Country Music Month radio spot ([Unidentified]) -- (05:28) Country Music Month radio spot ([Unidentified]) -- Test tones
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country Music Association (U.S.); Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Van Dyke, Leroy, 1929-; Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974; Wiseman, Mac; Atkins, Chet; Smith, Connie, 1941-; Minnie Pearl; Cannon, Sarah Ophelia, 1912-1996; Tucker, Tanya; Lynn, Loretta, 1932-;
